name: @tabletopandroid/airport-db-data-sqlite
description: SQLite database distribution of airport data for the airport-db ecosystem

scripts.build:full: npm run generate-db && npm run import-data && npm run copy-entry
scripts.clean: node -e "import fs from 'node:fs'; fs.rmSync('dist', { recursive: true, force: true });"
scripts.verify:dist-db: node -e "import fs from 'node:fs'; if (!fs.existsSync('dist/airports.sqlite')) { console.error('Missing dist/airports.sqlite. Run npm run build:full first.'); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run verify:dist-db && npm run build

author: tabletop ANDROID
